morsecodepalindromes module¶

morsecodepalindromes.main() → None¶

Main function that reads input, checks if it is a Morse code palindrome, and outputs the result.

It reads a single line of input, uses MorseCode to convert it to Morse code, and then uses PalindromeChecker to check if the converted Morse code is a palindrome. Outputs 1 if true, otherwise 0.

Morse Code Palindromes
